transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ha mam ha ha mam bol rahi hu ji ji ha thoda network ka issue hai.
Customer: Ha main ye bata rahi thi ki aap wo lead manager wala section dekh rahi hu jahan lead manager hai open hai open isme usme kya hoga usme sare tarah ki lead aapke pass save ho jayengi jaise agar kisi aapne jo by lead kharida man lijiye aapne do lead purchase kara do ya ek lead wo bhi usme dikhengi theek hai aur
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo samne se call ya message aaya hai unka data bhi usme dikhega to abhi jaise main aapko agar batau kisi client ka main name bhi batati hu jinka samne se aapko message aaya hai main aapka data open kar lu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aaj to do logo ka hai ha ek dekhiye inquiry aayi hui hai aapko Suraj ke naam se 12 November ko wo aaya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 12 November ko ek Dholpur karke jagah se aaya hua hai Suraj ka ha I am interested in e waste recycling plant ji mam direct inquiry hai samne se buyer ne aapko ye message kara hai yahan par aapka koi lead nahi kat raha hai aur sath hi sath aapko is client ka jo phone number hai wo sara kuch mil jata hai aap unke message pe click kariye upar unka number dikha hoga ji ji theek hai number gmail id view waha pe view more bhi hoga us pe aap click karenge to unka gmail id address sara kuch dikhta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Isi tarah kuch calls bhi aapko aayenge jaise ab kafi time se sir use nahi kar rahe the isko sham ko Jaspreet sir dekhte the na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha to abhi aap new matlab yahan pe aap aaye hain.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ha ok kitna time hua.
Customer: Mam one month hone wala hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha one month hone wala hai to pehle isme kam kuch din ho raha tha to isme aap dekh sakte hain voice kafi break ho rahi hai aapki ha kya bol rahi hai ek minute aap call pe hi raho main wifi band kar du aap call pe rehna mam.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello abhi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji mam clear now.
Executive: Ha ha ji main yahi keh rahi hu mam kafi time se account active nahi tha to usme aap dekh sakte hain purane bahut sare inquiry pade honge buyer ke to aap chahe to aap purane logo ko bhi abhi connect kar sakte hain kuch logo ka hota hai na ki wo inquiry to kiye rehte hain but abhi purchase nahi kiye hote hain ya fir baad me unka plan hota hai chahe to abhi bhi inko call kar sakte hain theek hai agar aapko free time ko call ho gaya bas yahi puchna tha ki ye by lead wale ka kitni limit hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achcha theek theek by lead ka to mam 17 ka limit hai abhi aap use karo agar aap chahte ho ye limit badhana to uske liye bhi hum aapko plan suggest kar denge taki aap ye limit bhi increase kar sakte ho kyuki kya hota hai na jaise sir ka ye tha ki use wo kar nahi rahe hain portal ko to unhone ek dam basic plan yahan pe purchase kar rakha tha ki bas matlab visibility maintain rahe delete na ho account ha lekin agar aap proper ab staff unhone hire kar liya jo isko use karega to aap ek achcha package le sakte hain jisme lead jyada honge aapke according jaise aap chahte ho ki aapko daily ke mujhe 10 15 lead chahiye 20 chahiye hai na aapka number ho sakta hai kuch bhi to uske according alag alag plans hai yahan pe to wo aap purchase karke use kar sakte hain theek hai mam.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ha aur sath hi mam mujhe ye bhi janna tha ki aapne abhi kuch buyer se baat kara India mart ke buyer se.
Customer: India mart ke to sare nahi abhi by leads wale me se maine kisi se bhi baat nahi kiya.
Executive: Achcha aur jo previous jo bache hue the na wo lead manager me jitne the un sab se baat kar chuke hain.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha unse kya baat chit hui hai matlab sahi buyer the.
Customer: Kafi positive buyer the usme bahut sare.
Executive: Achcha to usme se kitne do saal pehle ke the usme.
Customer: Achcha ha ha to usme se koi matlab aapko client mila jisse deal ho hui ho idhar bhi one month.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Deal nahi matlab abhi nahi deal hui hai but maine unko sir ko number forward kar diya Jaspreet sir ko.
Executive: Achcha apna they were interested.
Customer: Ha ha wahi cheez hai mam matlab aapka yahan pe best cheez ye hai ki aap manufacturer ho jahan tak mujhe pata hai manufacturer hai na aap ha plants ke to hamare pass matlab koi bhi hota hai na mushroom ke liye India mart pe hi aata hai manufacturer ko search karne.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: To ha India me all India se to aapke liye benefit ye hai ki aap pure all India client ko serve kar sakte hain theek hai to aapke liye achcha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Main Noida head office 135 se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ha aur aapke account manager bhi main hi hu abhi main aapko apna number share kar dungi ye mera office ka number hai theek hai main aapko apna number share kar dungi taki aapko jab bhi kuch bhi issue lage na aap mujhe whatsapp kar sakte hain ya samne se call bhi kar sakte hain theek hai ok mam theek hai aur ek cheez aur tha mam aaj aap sham ko ya abhi thode time me free hai kya video meeting pe connect karne ke liye taki aapka account thoda sa hum active mode me lagana tha ye thoda sa inactive me chal raha hai.
Customer: Ha koi issue nahi hai mam kar sakte hain aap.
Executive: Abhi kar sakte hain ya fir sham ko sham ko sham ko kitne baje aap bata dijiye main ek reminder laga du after four after four ek minute mam check kar lu theek hai mam after four main aapko connect karungi aur filhal ke liye mam aapka na hamare pass ek ticket raise ho gaya tha ki aapko help chahiye thi to abhi to mam aapko solution mil gaya hai na.
Customer: Ji theek hai.
Executive: Ha abhi main isko concern ko close kar sakti hu.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Theek hai aapke pass ek feedback ka message aayega feedback bejh dijiyega theek hai mam aur main aapko apna number share kar de rahi hu same number pe whatsapp hai.
Customer: Ah nahi is pe nahi hai mam.
Executive: Aap to company wala number hai ha achcha achcha to main aapko apna number bata du kya aap mera number note kar lijiye ha boliye 98 wait ha 98 388
Customer: 388
Executive: 49 49 583
Customer: 583
Executive: Ha aap isko Vaishnavi ke naam se save kar lijiye aur jab bhi aapko kuch bhi issue lage na to aap meri number pe direct call kariyega ok theek hai aur main aapko 4 baje ke baad ek bar call karungi ok thank you mam theek hai thank you mam you are welcome mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiring about the limit of buyleads.

- Account is running in inactive mode.



Resolution:

- Informed about the limit of buyleads.

- Executive offered a video meeting to activate account.

- Executive shared her contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled after 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account activation, video meeting
